sentences.en: A deputy treasurer may be appointed if necessary.
sentences.cn: 必要时,可设副总会计师.

sentences.en: Because he is treasurer and manager of the establishment.
sentences.cn: 因为他是这个学校的司库和管事。

sentences.en: Chairman , secretary and treasurer should be elected annually.
sentences.cn: 主席、秘书和司库应每年改选一次。

sentences.en: Elma was the nominee for Treasurer.
He agreed to act as treasurer.
He was also , accidentally, a warm personal friend of the State treasurer.
sentences.cn: 他恰巧又是州财政厅长的知己朋友.

sentences.en: He was proposed for the job of treasurer.
sentences.cn: 有建议说请他担任财务主管一职.

sentences.en: It's ironic that the weakest student in mathematics was elected class treasurer.
sentences.cn: 数学最差的学生竟被选为班级财务干事，这真是具有讽刺意味

sentences.en: It's ironical that the weakest student in mathematics was elected class treasurer.
sentences.cn: 数学最差的学生竟被选为班级财务干事,这真是具有讽刺意味.

sentences.en: Mark is the nominee for Treasurer.
The dishonest treasurer misappropriated the club funds.
sentences.cn: 那个不诚实的出纳员挪用了俱乐部的公款.

sentences.en: The treasurer receives tax collections and pays the county's debts.
sentences.cn: 司库收取税款并支付县债.

sentences.en: The treasurer rendered an account of all the money spent.
sentences.cn: 会计呈递了一份开支的清单.

sentences.en: The treasurer was arrested for trying to manipulate the company's financial records.
sentences.cn: 财务主管由于试图窜改公司财政帐目而被拘留.

sentences.en: Upon graduation she was assigned to the position of treasurer of the school.
sentences.cn: 一毕业她就被分配任学校的会计.

sentences.en: We make bald time itself the treasurer of our joys.
sentences.cn: 把无聊的时光变成享乐的源泉.

words.tran_cn: 会计；司库；财务主管；出纳员

trans.tran_en: someone who is officially responsible for the money for an organization, club, political party etc
